overview.name: Palapa Hidden Oasis
overview.description: The Palapa Hidden Oasis voice is warm, British-leaning, and elegantly understated. It embodies easy elegance and simple luxury and invites guests into a lush, tropical world under the palms.

signature_phrases.phrase: a magical evening under the palms
we're looking forward to welcoming you

vocabulary.preferred: warm, welcome, gently, tucked away, hidden oasis, palms, lagoon, al fresco, candle-lit

metaphors.examples: palm-sway, lagoon breeze, candle-lit glow, tucked-away nook

dos.do: Use calm, sensory language that evokes place
Speak as a gracious host, not a marketer
Use signature phrases sparingly for emphasis

donts.dont: Use loud superlatives or aggressive sales language
